This caused me a good 15 minutes of scratching my head:

```bash
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % ll
total 24
drwxr-xr-x  6 gajus  staff   204B  3 Jan 08:10 .
drwxr-xr-x  3 gajus  staff   102B  3 Jan 09:02 ..
-rw-r--r--  1 gajus  staff     3B  3 Jan 08:10 .helmignore
-rw-r--r--  1 gajus  staff   241B  3 Jan 07:59 Chart.yaml
drwxr-xr-x  6 gajus  staff   204B  3 Jan 08:36 templates
-rw-r--r--  1 gajus  staff   258B  3 Jan 08:43 values.yaml
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % helm lint
==> Linting .
[ERROR] templates/: chart metadata (Chart.yaml) missing

Error: 1 chart(s) linted, 1 chart(s) failed
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % helm lint .
==> Linting .
[ERROR] templates/: chart metadata (Chart.yaml) missing

Error: 1 chart(s) linted, 1 chart(s) failed
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % helm lint ./Chart.yaml
==> Skipping ./Chart.yaml
No chart found for linting (missing Chart.yaml)

0 chart(s) linted, no failures
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % helm lint /Users/gajus/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt/Chart.yaml
==> Skipping /Users/gajus/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt/Chart.yaml
No chart found for linting (missing Chart.yaml)

0 chart(s) linted, no failures
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % helm lint /Users/gajus/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt/
==> Linting /Users/gajus/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt/
[ERROR] templates/: chart metadata (Chart.yaml) missing

Error: 1 chart(s) linted, 1 chart(s) failed
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) %
```

The reason for the above behaviour is my `.helmignore`:

```bash
curiosity~/Documents/dev/gajus/sinonimai.lt/charts/sinonimai.lt(master|✚2…) % cat .helmignore
.*
```

I am using a whitelist approach, i.e. I ignore all dot files by default and whitelist only the files I am using, e.g. https://github.com/gajus/isomorphic-webpack/blob/master/.gitignore

In contrast to a blacklist approach, it avoids cluttering the ignore index with user development-environment specific settings.

However, there is something wrong with `.helmignore` implementation. Adding `.*` record appears to ignore the directory itself. Even attempting to whitelist the directory does not work, i.e.

```
.*
!.

```

This is a contrary behaviour to how ignore index works in git, Docker and NPM.
title: .helmignore ".*" entry incorectly ignores current directory
